alert.note: Alert for Alcorn; Prentiss; Tishomingo (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 5:23AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Tishomingo, northeastern Prentiss and Alcorn Counties through 615 AM CDT... At 523 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Hinkle, or 8 miles south of Corinth, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Corinth, Booneville, Iuka, J P Coleman State Park, Tishomingo State Park, Belmont, Burnsville, Glen, Tishomingo, Pineflat, Thrashers, Hinkle, Burton, Midway, Leedy, Farmington, Guys, Rienzi, Kossuth and Golden. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
